title: Guy Benson Reacts To Katie Hill Resignation: No Sense of Accountability or Responsibility On Her End
text:
Democratic Rep. Katie Hill on Monday decried revenge porn as "one of the worst things" that can be done to someone -- after compromising photos of her surfaced in her explosive sex scandal. In a fiery new video, the California Democrat said she will take up a fight against such online attacks in the wake of her resignation from Congress. "I am going to continue to fight for our democracy, for representation, for justice and equality and making the world a better place," she said Monday. "And I will also take up a new fight. I will fight to ensure that no one else has to live through what I just experienced. Hill announced her resignation Sunday in a statement, which blasted her estranged husband, Kenny Heslep, and political operatives who "happily provide a platform to a monster."

Fox News Radio's Guy Benson reacts.
